message-pack.name: SWIFT - Category 5
message-pack.description: S.W.I.F.T. SCRL is the abbreviation for Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication, Societe Cooperative a Responsibilite Limited. SWIFT's purpose is to provide technology-based communication services across all financial markets through member banks so that they can profitably meet their own and their end-customers' needs. This pack includes Category 5 messages. Minimum dependency for this message pack is Swift Plugin 5.1.2. For additional information please refer Release notes/readme document.
